EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Financial Services Briefing - Delivering Innovation to Market Faster
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline Thank you for registering for the upcoming Financial Services Briefing <http://pivotal.io/delivering-innovation-to-market-faster-briefing/london> in London. Please find the event details below:
Date: June 4, 2015 Time: 3:00 PM - 8:00 PM Location: Pivotal London Office, Bentima House, 168-172 Old Street, London EC1V 9BP
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
Questions? Please contact us email us <mailto:info@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
